spec.expr:
_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| count() total_logs, count_uniq(fwb.main_type) unique_main_type, count_uniq(fwb.sub_type) unique_sub_type, count_uniq(fwb.app_name) unique_app_name

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
AND source.ip:in(
  _stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
  | fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
  | $Logsql
  | top 10 (source.ip)
  | keep source.ip
  )
  | by (source.ip) count() results

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
AND url.domain:in(
  _stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
  | fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
  | $Logsql
    | top 10 (url.domain)
    | keep url.domain
  )
  | by (url.domain) count() results

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (source.ip,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.srccountry,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.service,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.sub_type,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.threat_level,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.main_type,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.app_name) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.main_type) count() results

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.app_name,fwb.threat_level,fwb.action) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc 
| limit 10

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.main_type,fwb.sub_type) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc

_stream:{fwb.cat=attack}
| fwb.main_type:(${main_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.sub_type:(${sub_type:doublequote}) AND fwb.app_name:(${app_name:doublequote}) AND fwb.action:(${action:doublequote}) AND fwb.threat_level:(${threat_level:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fwb.sub_type) count() results

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
